The atmosphere on your ship changes dramatically as soon as you notice a space-time anomaly near the uninhabited ocean planet around which this beacon was built. A minute after arrival, you receive a strange transmission request that seems to have come from the anomaly itself. You remember that Miracle Seekers asked you to carry out the request of someone inside the space rift in order to close it.
Accept the transmission.
You accept the transmission, and a pre-recorded message begins to play in your piloting. You hear a synthesized male voice that clearly does not belong to a living being. "Finally, someone is interested in me. I managed to escape from my own decaying universe, but I am stuck in the space between worlds, like all those who tried to escape from my "homeland" with me. Every year there are more and more of them, and there is very little room for all of us in this swamp between universes, and I'm tired of their company. Whoever you are, I propose a deal: I will redirect these creatures to you, and you deal with them in any way you see fit; I know how to pay. If you want to carry out this simple task, just send the message “I accept” to this space-time rift. Make sure you are strong enough to face these creatures - I take no pleasure in seeing more suffering than there already is."
Send the message "I accept."
You send a message to the transmission coordinates. A couple of minutes pass before the rift in space begins to glow brighter than usual, and seems to grow slightly larger. EG_SPACE_RIFT_BG_FIGHT
